original_title: Nightclub, Memories of Havana in Queens
overview: Three Latin dancers in a nightclub in Queens make up, and do a samba, a merengue and an afro-cuban dance. Filmed both tongue-in-cheek with humor and satire at the kitsch aspects, and also seriously as a tribute to the culture's ancient sensuality.
title: Nightclub, Memories of Havana in Queens
